formalpara.title: Figure 3. Variations in the establishment of embryonic polarity
formalpara.para: a, C. elegans, 98% of all embryos point with their posterior pole toward the vulva; b, A. nanus, 98% of all embryos point with their anterior pole toward the vulva; c, d, D. coronatus, equal proportions of embryos point with their anterior or posterior pole toward the vulva; arrows indicate orientation of eggs in the uterus; arrowheads, position of the vulva; red, posteriorly located germline cells P2 (a, b) or P3 (c, d). Scale bars, 10 μm. From Lahl et al., 2005.
